competition_summary.context: competition law and false and misleading statements by Keurig. To date, this plaintiff has not taken substantive action to prosecute its claims. KDP intends to vigorously defend the remaining lawsuits described above. At this time, the Company is unable to predict the outcome of these lawsuits, the potential loss or range of loss, if any, associated with the resolution of these lawsuits or any potential effect they may have on the Company or its operations.
